# WKInterfaceScrollPosition.centeredVertically

**Case**

The vertical center of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case centeredVertically
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.bottom**: The bottom of the screen.
- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.top**: The top of the screen.
title: WKInterfaceScrollPosition.centeredVertically
